price: Kandi ntimuzavange ukuri n’ikinyoma, cyangwa ngo muhishe ukuri kandi mukuzi.
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
